Tanks

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the level of a game generated from a text file and contains the LevelObjects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Level()

      Draw all elements in the level by current frame.

      processing.core.PImage getTreesSprite() 
      int getWind() 
      void restartLevel()
      Restarts a level by resetting the wind,projectiles,tanks,trees and terrain.
      void setBackground(processing.core.PImage background)
      Sets up the background image of the level to be used when creating the level.
      void setForegroundColour(java.lang.String foregroundColour)
      Sets up the foreground colour of the level to be used when creating the level.
      void setHeight(int[] inputHeight)
      Changes the terrain heights
      void setLayout(java.lang.String layoutInput)
      Takes the file path of the level text file to be created.
      void setProjectiles(Projectile projectile)
      Every time a projectile is created, a projectile object is added to the level list of projectile objects to be drawn.
      void setTreeSprite(processing.core.PImage trees)
      Sets up the tree image of the level to be used when creating the level and drawing the trees.
      void setWind(java.lang.Integer wind)
      Changes the wind by a value between -5 and 5 after every player turn by a player.

        Takes the file path of the level text file to be created.

        layoutInput - File path of the level text file.

      • setProjectiles

        public void setProjectiles(Projectile projectile)
        Every time a projectile is created, a projectile object is added to the level list of projectile objects to be drawn.
        Parameters:
        projectile - Projectile object to be drawn in the level

      • getProjectiles

        public java.util.ArrayList<Projectile> getProjectiles()
        Returns:
        The list of projectile in the level.

      • setWind

        public void setWind(java.lang.Integer wind)
        Changes the wind by a value between -5 and 5 after every player turn by a player.
        Parameters:
        wind - Old win wind value on the level

      • getWind

        public int getWind()
        Returns:
        Current wind value of the level.

        public processing.core.PImage getTreesSprite()
        Returns:

      • getHeight

        public int[] getHeight()
        Returns:
        The height of the terrain of the level at each x-coordinates.

      • setHeight

        public void setHeight(int[] inputHeight)
        Changes the terrain heights
        Parameters:
        inputHeight - List of integers representing the height of the terrain at each x-coordinates.

      • getPlayerTurn

        public java.util.TreeSet<java.lang.Character> getPlayerTurn()
        Returns:
        A natural ordering of the Character and Tank HashMap, used to create the playerTurn iterator.

      • getPlayerTanks

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,Tank> getPlayerTanks()

      • restartLevel

        public void restartLevel()

      • draw

        Draw all elements in the level by current frame.
